title: Why is my opinion about Fiora getting reworked irrelevent when I'm the best Fiora?
body:
Riot you destroyed Fiora...

Nobody here has played as many games on her as I have.

Why do their opinions matter more than mine?

Why do the developers opinions matter when they don't even play Fiora or like her as a champ in the 1st place?

Who made you god of the 1st E-sport Riot?

You'll destroy the 1st e-sport just to ban me from ranked because how good I am and to pick on my champ? 

Why is this topic spam to you?

Why do I need to be banned for a week just because I point out that you are being a bully in the 1st place?

I've played 1000's of games on Fiora and you destroyed her lunge and her ult.

Everyone who has something to say about it is just bitter because I'm better at the game than they are...

It's not right.

I'm the best Fiora I should get to keep my main instead of this half assed version where my ult doesn't even activate because some "teammate" stole the kill.

If the new Fiora is "fine for you"  you are a noob and you are a Fiora hater.

If you had a Ferrari and Riot said no...  you get a Pinto now would you be happy with it?   

Old Fiora = Ferrari 
New Fiora = Pinto

Fiora = Nerfed Q  Double lunge Lunge (The death of Fiora)  No more level 1 pentakills...

Fiora = Ult that is basically missing now that hardly ever even works.
